title: gurunaathaa
sahitya:
gurunAthA anugrahahisai dEva shrI sad





anupallavi



 parama puruSA ninna pAda bhaktiya nIDi pAshA jnAnavanupari harisi pAlisai



caraNam

 cAmuNDAmbA dEvi shaktya aSTOttara shata nAmagaLigE shubha sangIta kritigaLanu

nIlagaLa harikEsha nirmalAkAranE nitya shuddha muktanE nirjarEsha vinutanE
